about_the_game:
Experience Mind-Blowing Orgasms with Your Gamepad, Your Ultimate Orgasm Machine!

Ready to take your pleasure to the next level? Discover the thrill of turning your gaming controller into a discreet, customizable vibrator with iVIBRATE Ultimate Edition!

Masturbate with complete control over every vibration and intensity, ensuring each moment is tailored to your deepest desires. Whether you're exploring gentle pulses or intense rhythms, you'll cum with a satisfaction that only personalized pleasure can provide. It's time to take cumming to a whole new level!

💖 Elevate Your Pleasure

  • Minimized Play: Enjoy the vibrations while watching your favorite videos or even when playing your favorite games. iVIBRATE Ultimate Edition can run in the background, so you can indulge whenever the mood strikes.

  • 30 Exquisite Vibration Patterns: Explore a variety of preset rhythms or create your own unique patterns to match your desires. Every pulse is a pathway to intense orgasms.

  • Personalized Custom Vibration Patterns: Take full control by creating your own vibration patterns that hit all the right spots.

  • Seamless Shuffle Mode: Let spontaneity guide you by shuffling through all 30 patterns for unpredictable and thrilling sensations.

  • Precision Intensity Control: Adjust the strength of each motor with intuitive sliders, giving you complete command over every sensation. Tailor your experience for maximum satisfaction.

  • Versatile Controls: Prefer onscreen interaction? Use your mouse or virtual cursor alongside gamepad controls for maximum flexibility in how you achieve your climax.

🌐 Share the Pleasure with Multiplayer Modes

  • Up to 4-Player Local Multiplayer: Amplify the excitement whether you're indulging solo or with friends.

  • Perfect for Parties: Spice up gatherings with an unforgettable interactive experience that will have everyone buzzing.

  • Steam Remote Play: Only one person needs iVIBRATE for up to four people to join in. Control your partner's gamepad or let them control yours—or everyone can control each other's gamepads. Connect and share sensations with friends across the globe, making distance disappear.

⭐ Enhance Your Journey with Extra Features

  • Dual Locking System: Secure your session with both physical and onscreen locks to prevent accidental interruptions, ensuring nothing stands between you and your orgasm.

  • Accessibility Options: Customize backgrounds, text, and button colors to suit your visual preferences. Choose from vibrant color combinations to enhance accessibility and personalize the look of the app. Includes Open Dyslexia 2 & 3 fonts for improved readability, so nothing distracts you from your pleasure.

🤚 One-Handed Mode 

  • ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

🎮 Gamepad Excellence at Your Fingertips

  • Native Gamepad Support: Seamlessly connect with your favorite controllers for an immersive pleasure experience.

  • Customizable Button Mapping: Personalize every button to suit your desires, making your path to orgasm even smoother.

  • Wide Compatibility: Supports any vibrating gamepad, including third-party controllers, Xbox 360, Xbox One, Xbox Series, PS4, PS5, and more. Your pleasure options are limitless.

  • Exclusive DS4 Enhancements: Sync the lightbar with vibrations, choose your glow, and keep an eye on battery life—all enhancing your intimate journey.

  • Instant Gamepad Switching: Hot-swap controllers without missing a beat, so nothing interrupts your path to ecstasy.

  • Tailored Onscreen Guides: Visual prompts designed specifically for your gamepad type ensure you stay in control even in the heat of the moment.

🎁 Unlock Additional Delights with 3 FREE DLCs

  • Steering Wheel Support: Rev up your orgasms as your steering wheel transforms into a powerful pleasure device, rotating rapidly back and forth to help you masturbate your way to intense climaxes.

  • Classic Video Backgrounds: Relish in 4 nostalgic visuals from previous iVIBRATE editions, setting the perfect mood for your sessions.

  • iMASSAGE Gold Edition Conversion: Transform your interface with a touch of elegance and luxury, enhancing your overall experience.

🌍 Available in 29 Languages

  • Localized Accessibility: Localized for all major languages supported by Steam, bringing pleasure worldwide. No matter where you are, iVIBRATE is ready to satisfy.

⚠️ Please Note:

  • Vibration functions and strength may vary based on the controller used.

  • Nintendo Switch Pro & JoyCon gamepads are not compatible with this app.
